content:
Which version of Thunderbird do you have?

Does the second account have a "junk" folder?

The server usually creates and controls spam folders. Your second account may have one that is not being shown. Right click on the account name in the folder pane, select "Subscribe", and see if a spam folder appears in the list of folders to subscribe to. If it's there but not checked, check it.
creator: mozilla98

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: Those error messages are coming from your email provider via Thunderbird. The website uses different settings. If you post screenshots of your incoming server settings pane and also of your SMTP server settings pane, plus complete text of error message in English, someone here with familiarity with your email provider requirements may have suggestions. Thank you,
creator: davidsk

content:
Thuderbird zabudnuté HLAVNÉ heslo k Thunderbirdu: Heslo pre softvérové zabezpečenie ste si museli sami nastaviť. Pokiaľ sa žiadosť stále zobrazuje, tak sa to dá rozchodiť RESETOVANÍM HESLA k Thunderbirdu. Resetovanie ale vymaže všetky uložené heslá v Thunderbirde. Je to preto, aby nedošlo k ľahkému získaniu ďalších hesiel neoprávnenou osobou. Pred týmto úkonom si vypíšte na papier všetky hesla z Thunderbirdu: http://imgbank.cz/images/2014/11/12/thunderbird_hesla.jpg a potom http://imgbank.cz/images/2014/11/12/thunderbird_hesla_zobrazit.jpg a potom http://imgbank.cz/images/2014/11/12/Thunderbird_hesla3.jpg a tu ich máš zapísané.

Resetovanie hesla vykonajte takto: Otvorte ponuku "Nástroje/Chybová konzola" (CTRL+SHIFT+J) a do políčka "Kód:" vložte nasledujúci kód: openDialog("chrome://pippki/content/resetpassword.xul") Kliknite na "Vyhodnotiť" a potom sa otvorí dialógové okno pre odstránenie hlavného hesla. http://imgbank.cz/images/2015/01/09/Thunderbird_chybova_konzola2.jpg
creator: Ansamb

content: In settings>privacy&security UNTICK the option to move to junk folder In account settings>junk settings, you have the ability select in which folder to place junk
